work.name: Oak Ridge National Laboratory
work.position: Distinguished Staff Fellow | Electric Machinery Design Researcher
work.summary: Conceptualize, propose, and lead research projects to develop rare-earth free sustainable electro-mechanical systems.
highlights: Awarded $700k in LDRD funding as Alvin M. Weinberg Fellow

work.name: General Electric Company (GE Research)
work.summary: Conceptualize, propose, and lead research projects to develop electro-mechanical systems for aircraft electrification, lunar and spaceboard power; mentor junior staff and interns.
highlights: eFLITES - ARPA-E project, Lunar Power (NASA contract)

work.name: University of Wisconsin-Madison
work.summary: Projects on off-highway vehicle electrification, multi-material additive manufacturing for rare-earth-free machines, and multi-harmonic electric machines; graduate student mentoring.
highlights: Development of the first multi-material solid SynR rotor

work.name: University of Wisconsin-Madison
work.summary: Projects on off-highway vehicle electrification, additive manufacturing for rare-earth-free machines, and multi-harmonic electric machines; teaching ECE courses; graduate student mentoring.

work.name: Mitsubishi Electric Research Laboratory
work.summary: Developed techniques for the topology optimization of Electric Machines
